title: IHE ITI Mobile Care Services Discovery
introduction:
## The IHE Mobile Care Services Discovery (mCSD)
This IG provides a transaction for mobile and lightweight browser-based applications to find and update care services resources.

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
Public Comment - Addition of Feed Transaction.  Minor fixes for issues.
list.descmd:
Version 4.0.0
- Trial Implementation with addition of ITI-130 Feed Transaction (Create, Update, Delete, Batch/Transaction)
- Updated and reconfigured actor names and options to improve clarity
- Fix for [Issue 166](https://github.com/IHE/ITI.mCSD/issues/166)
- Fix for [Issue 157](https://github.com/IHE/ITI.mCSD/issues/157)
- Fix for [Issue 158](https://github.com/IHE/ITI.mCSD/issues/166)
- Changed CapabilityStatements to use FSH

list.desc: Public Comment - Addition of Feed Transaction.  Minor fixes for issues.
list.descmd:
Version 4.0.0-comment
- Public Comment for addition of ITI-130 Feed Transaction (Create, Update, Delete, Batch/Transaction)

- Fix for [Issue 157](https://github.com/IHE/ITI.mCSD/issues/157)
- Fix for [Issue 158](https://github.com/IHE/ITI.mCSD/issues/166)
- Changed CapabilityStatements to use FSH

list.desc: Public-Comment: addition of Endpoint and OrganizationAffiliation
Normative release for Trial Implementation - Converted to IG publisher and google analytics
